00060 #include "EALib/sqr.h"
00061 #include "EALib/Population.h"
00062 
00063 //=======================================================================
00064 //
00065 // fitness function: sphere model
00066 //
00067 double sphere( const std::vector< double >& x )
00068 {
00069     unsigned i;
00070     double   sum;
00071     for( sum = 0., i = 0; i < x.size( ); i++ )
00072         sum += sqr( x[ i ] );
00073     return sum;
00074 }
00075 
00076 //=======================================================================
00077 //
00078 // main program
00079 //
00080 int main( int argc, char **argv )
00081 {
00082     //
00083     // constants
00084     //
00085     const unsigned PopSize     = 50;
00086     const unsigned Dimension   = 20;
00087     const unsigned NumOfBits   = 10;
00088     const unsigned Iterations  = 10000;
00089     const unsigned DspInterval = 100;
00090     const unsigned Omega       = 5;
00091     const unsigned CrossPoints = 2;
00092     const double   CrossProb   = 0.6;
00093     const double   FlipProb    = 1. / ( Dimension * NumOfBits );
00094     const bool     UseGrayCode = true;
00095     const Interval RangeOfValues( -3, +5 );
00096 
00097     unsigned i, t;
00098 
00099     //
00100     // initialize random number generator
00101     //
00102     Rng::seed( argc > 1 ? atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) : 1234 );
00103 
00104     //
00105     // define populations
00106     //
00107     Individual kid( ChromosomeT< bool >( Dimension * NumOfBits ) );
00108     Population pop( PopSize, kid );
00109 
00110     //
00111     // scaling window
00112     //
00113     std::vector< double > window( Omega );
00114 
00115     //
00116     // temporary chromosome for decoding
00117     //
00118     ChromosomeT< double > dblchrom;
00119 
00120     //
00121     // minimization task
00122     //
00123     pop.setMinimize( );
00124 
00125     //
00126     // initialize all chromosomes of the population
00127     //
00128     for( i = 0; i < pop.size( ); ++i ) {
00129         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( pop[ i ][ 0 ] ).initialize( );
00130         dblchrom.decodeBinary( pop[ i ][ 0 ], RangeOfValues, NumOfBits, UseGrayCode );
00131         pop[ i ].setFitness( sphere( dblchrom ) );
00132     }
00133 
00134     //
00135     // iterate
00136     //
00137     for( t = 0; t < Iterations; ++t ) {
00138         //
00139         // scale fitness values and use proportional selection
00140         //
00141         pop.linearDynamicScaling( window, t );
00142 
00143         //
00144         // recombine by crossing over two parents
00145         //
00146         if( Rng::coinToss( CrossProb ) )
00147             kid[ 0 ].crossover( pop.selectOneIndividual( )[ 0 ],
00148                                 pop.selectOneIndividual( )[ 0 ],
00149                                 CrossPoints );
00150         else
00151             kid = pop.selectOneIndividual( );
00152 
00153         //
00154         // mutate by flipping bits
00155         //
00156         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( kid[ 0 ] ).flip( FlipProb );
00157 
00158         //
00159         // evaluate objective function
00160         //
00161         dblchrom.decodeBinary( kid[ 0 ], RangeOfValues, NumOfBits, UseGrayCode );
00162         kid.setFitness( sphere( dblchrom ) );
00163 
00164         //
00165         // replace the worst individual in the population
00166         //
00167         pop.worst( ) = kid;
00168 
00169         //
00170         // print out best value found so far
00171         //
00172         if( t % DspInterval == 0 )
00173             std::cout << t << "\tbest value = "
00174                  << pop.best( ).fitnessValue( ) << "\n";
00175     }
00176 
00177     return 0;
00178 }
